LanguageData.YorkshireTerrier.label: yorkshire terrier
LanguageData.YorkshireTerrier.description: A small, even-tempered dog. Originally bred to hunt rats, it later became a show and companionship animal.
LanguageData.YorkshireTerrier_Leather.label: yorkieskin
LanguageData.YorkshireTerrier_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a yorkshire terrier.
LanguageData.YorkshireTerrier_Meat.label: yorkshire terrier meat
LanguageData.YorkshireTerrier_Meat.description: Raw flesh of a yorkshire terrier.
LanguageData.YorkshireTerrier_Corpse.label: yorkshire terrier corpse
LanguageData.YorkshireTerrier_Corpse.description: Dead body of a yorkshire terrier.
LanguageData.Husky.label: husky
LanguageData.Husky.description: A large, energetic dog with a thick fur coat for remaining comfortable in arctic environments.
LanguageData.Husky_Leather.label: husky fur
LanguageData.Husky_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a husky.
LanguageData.Husky_Meat.label: husky meat
LanguageData.Husky_Corpse.label: husky corpse
LanguageData.LabradorRetriever.label: labrador retriever
LanguageData.LabradorRetriever.description: A very versatile, medium-sized dog. Originally bred to retrieve birds shot on the hunt, the lab is also an excellent guard dog, play pal, and family friend.
LanguageData.LabradorRetriever_Leather.label: labrador fur
LanguageData.LabradorRetriever_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a labrador retriever.
LanguageData.LabradorRetriever_Meat.label: labrador retriever meat
LanguageData.LabradorRetriever_Meat.description: Raw flesh of a labrador retriever.
LanguageData.LabradorRetriever_Corpse.label: labrador retriever corpse
LanguageData.LabradorRetriever_Corpse.description: Dead body of a labrador retriever.
LanguageData.Cat.label: cat
LanguageData.Cat.description: One of mankind's first pets, the cat is a small mammal which hunts vermin. Known for their aloofness, cats are nevertheless popular companions because of their calmness, independence, and fine, pettable fur.
LanguageData.Cat_Leather.label: catskin
LanguageData.Cat_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a cat.
LanguageData.Cat_Meat.label: cat meat
LanguageData.Cat_Corpse.label: cat corpse
